title: Things to Do in Moncks Corner and Berkeley County
author: Post; Courier
description: Looking for something to do in Moncks Corner and the Berkeley area? Search a comprehensive events calendar from the Berkeley Independent.
cleaned_text: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. Hot. High 93F. Winds light and variable.. Partly cloudy skies. Low 72F. Winds light and variable. Updated: September 7, 2023 @ 5:58 am
